languages.text: {n}Во взгляде арбитра возникает теплый огонек.{/n} "В таком случае мой ответ на ваш вопрос — да".
{n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "In that case, my answer to your question is yes."
languages.original_text: {n}Во взгляде арбитра возникает теплый огонек.{/n} "В таком случае мой ответ на ваш вопрос — да".

languages.text: {n}彼のまなざしに、あたたかな光が宿った。{/n}「そういうことなら、あなたの問いへの私の答えはイエスです」
languages.original_text: {n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "In that case, my answer to your question is yes."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼のまなざしに、あたたかな光が宿った。{/n}「そういうことなら、あなたの問いへの私の答えはイエスです」

languages.text: {n}Ein warmes Licht erhellt seinen Blick.{/n} "In diesem Fall lautet meine Antwort auf Eure Frage Ja."
languages.original_text: {n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "In that case, my answer to your question is yes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein warmes Licht erhellt seinen Blick.{/n} "In diesem Fall lautet meine Antwort auf Eure Frage Ja."

languages.text: {n}Son visage s'éclaire.{/n} « Dans ce cas, oui, j'aimerais connaître votre réponse. »
languages.original_text: {n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "In that case, my answer to your question is yes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son visage s'éclaire.{/n} « Dans ce cas, oui, j'aimerais connaître votre réponse. »

languages.text: {n}Un brillo cálido asoma a su mirada.{/n} «En ese caso, mi respuesta a su pregunta es sí».
languages.original_text: {n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "In that case, my answer to your question is yes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un brillo cálido asoma a su mirada.{/n} «En ese caso, mi respuesta a su pregunta es sí».

languages.text: {n}他的目光中浮现出一丝温暖的光芒。{/n}“既然如此，我的答复是‘想’。”
languages.original_text: {n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "In that case, my answer to your question is yes."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的目光中浮现出一丝温暖的光芒。{/n}“既然如此，我的答复是‘想’。”

languages.text: {n}Bakışlarında sıcak bir ışık beliriyor.{/n} "O zaman cevabım evet."
languages.original_text: {n}A warm light appears in his gaze.{/n} "In that case, my answer to your question is yes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bakışlarında sıcak bir ışık beliriyor.{/n} "O zaman cevabım evet."
